name: Bubblegum Hula Hoop
description:
~3 colors of pink adorn the sparkly base of this hoop. Perfect for the beginner or anyone who wants to stun a crowd.

Figure 8 collapsible, easy -just bend and fold, perfect for vacations and easy transportation. Instructions included with purchase. 2 hoop sizes to choose from: 36" or 40" 3/4 160 psi.

Standard hoops come in 40" and are roughly 1.5 lbs., this is a perfect size for adults, if you are 5"2' or smaller order a 36" hoop.

name: Roy G Biv Hula Hoop
description:
~4 Piece Push Button Hoop~ 

The popular and classic Roy G Biv hoop offered as a push button. This hoop is special, rearrange the hoop and make it into a new pattern!

These hoops are super portable, put them in your backpack or stow them away in your car to have at a moments notice. Buy several and mix and match patterns, add a section and increase the size of your hoop for tough tricks. There is nothing bad about these hoops!

Rivets ensure each connector will not pull away from the hoop, Push button release is easy for anyone to do. Connector points are tight to ensure a no pinch experience. 

This hoop can be 40" or 36"-100 psi
